sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO EVENT_DBEVENT ( TITLE , CONTENT , SENDER , SENDER_ALIAS , EMAIL , CONTENT_TYPE , EVENT_ID , USER_INFO , EMAIL_INSERT_TYPE , WASSENDED , EMAIL_DATA_TYPE , USERID ) VALUES( #title# , #content# , #sender# , #senderAlias# , #email# , #contentType# , #eventId# , #userInfo# , #emailInsertType# , #wasSended# , #emailDataType# , #userId# )
